name: lootman
description: A set of scripts to fetch the source code of Lootman under development in the Fallout 4 game directory, and to generate binaries for release.

scripts.fetch: npm run fetch:papyrus && npm run fetch:config-esp
scripts.collect: npm run collect:common && npm run collect:dll && npm run collect:papyrus && npm run collect:fomod-files
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run collect && npm run compile:papyrus && npm run archive2 && node scripts/make-fomod.js

author: EideeHi
